name: Mission Demolition (RoyZhang)
description:
Title: Mission Demolition

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: This is a very simple game for all ages. Everyone can find some fun in it.

 Instructions: This game uses the mouse to drag the ball and launch it. If the ball hits the green target inside the castle it will goes to the next stage. The goal is to hit the green target inside the castle.

Game Design Team 

Ruoyu Zhang – Game Designer
